titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 333) to amend title 11, United States Code, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-618, by Mr. Sessions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 205.

bill.summary: 7/26/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R.333 (bankruptcy law and consumer credit).
